effect.sun-moon: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.

short_effect.sun-moon: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
